de.agilecoders.wicket.markup.html.bootstrap.behavior

Interface CssClassNameProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Alert.Type, BootstrapPagingNavigator.Position, CodeBehavior.Language, FormType, IconType, ImageBehavior.Type, InputBehavior.Size, LabelType, Layout, Navbar.Position, Offset, Orientation, Pagination.Alignment, ProgressBar.Type, SpanType, WellBehavior.Size, Width

    public interface CssClassNameProvider
    The CssClassNameProvider provides an interface to abstract the styling of a component and the rendering of the class attribute. This interface can be used with a Enum: 
         public enum Color implements {
         Red, Blue;

         public String cssClassName() {
             return name().toLowerCase();
         }

         public CssClassNameAppender newCssClassNameModifier() {
             return new CssClassNameAppender(cssClassName());
         }
     }

     public MyColoredComponent extends Component {
         public MyColoredComponent(String id, Color color) {
             super(id);

             add(color.newCssClassNameModifier());
         }
     }
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    miha
